select movie_id,room_id,time_start,time_end, showtimes_detail.id as id from showtimes_detail
inner join movie m on showtimes_detail.movie_id = m.id
and movie_id = #{movieId}
and room_id = #{roomId}
and time_start = #{timeStart}
and m.name like concat('%',#{search},'%')
order by
id
showtimes_id
movie_id
room_id
time_start
DESC
limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

select distinct showtimes_detail.id,t.id as theaterId,s.dayshowtimes as dayshowtimes, t.name as theaterName, l.name as locationName from showtimes_detail join location l on showtimes_detail.location_id = l.id join movie m on showtimes_detail.movie_id = m.id join showtimes s on showtimes_detail.showtimes_id = s.id join theater t on showtimes_detail.theater_id = t.id where l.id = #{location} and s.dayshowtimes = #{date}
